answers.answer: Look at this web site which explains insulin resistancehttp://diabetes.niddk.nih.gov/dm/pubs/insulinresistance/Also, there is a blood test called HgbA1c (hemoglobin A1c) that measures glucose levels on NEW red blood cells for the past three months. This is an average of the amount of glucose in your body for this time period measured in %. Fasting glucose is one method of checking but its short term. You can read about it herehttp://www.ucsfhealth.org/adult/adam/data/003640.html
